import java.util.*;
import java.lang.*;
import java.io.*;

/**
* Given a 2D array, find the maximum sum subarray in it
*/
class Codechef
{
    static int combination(int a, int b){
        int den =1, num=1;
        for(int i=1;i<=b;i++){
            num=num*(a-b+i);
            den=den*i;
        }return num/den;
    }
    public static void main (String[] args) throws java.lang.Exception
	{
		Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
		int n = sc.nextInt();
		int m = sc.nextInt();
		int h = sc.nextInt();
		int count=0;
		int hisDept=0;
		//sc.nextLine();
		for(int i=1;i<=m;i++){
		    if(i==h)
		        hisDept=sc.nextInt()-1;
	        else
	            count+=sc.nextInt();
		}if(count+1+hisDept<n)
		    System.out.println("-1");
	    else{
    		int a=combination(count,n-2)*hisDept;
    		int b = combination(count+hisDept,n-1);
    		String res = String.format("%.6f",(double)(a/b));
    		System.out.println(res);
	    }
	}
}
